name: music-activity-booking
description: An easy, convenient music activity reservation website

scripts.build: npm run minify:css && npm run minify:js
scripts.minify:css: npx clean-css-cli -o css/styles.min.css css/layout.css css/responsive.css css/animations.css
scripts.minify:js: npx terser js/main.js js/form-handler.js js/gallery.js js/calendar.js js/supabase-client.js -o js/bundle.min.js
